titleStmt.title: Two discourses 1. of baptisme, its institution, and efficacy upon all believers. 2. Of prayer ex tempore, or by pretence of the spirit. / By Jer: Taylor D.D.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

titleStmt.title: Two discourses 1. of baptisme, its institution, and efficacy upon all believers. 2. Of prayer ex tempore, or by pretence of the spirit. / By Jer: Taylor D.D.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Flesher for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: The words "baptisme, .. believers." and "prayer .. spirit." are bracketed together on title page.

A reissue of "A discourse concerning prayer ex tempore" (Wing T313), and either the 1652 or 1653 edition of "A discourse of baptisme" (Wing T315 or T316), with added general title page and conjugate blank, and with separate title pages cancelled. In the 1652 edition of "A discourse of baptisme" p. 1 is signed "B"; in the 1653 edition it is signed "A3".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb 3d"; the final 'I' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears on UMI microfilm (Thomason Tracts), reels 105 (part 2 only) and 247.
